title: Restaurant
description: Excellent Polish cuisine is an asset of Jab≈Çonkowy Las.
text: We serve classic Polish dishes prepared on site from fresh, local products.
breakfast1: For breakfast, we always serve a hot dish, e.g. omelette, pancakes or scrambled eggs. Everyday is something different. Later, we serve cheeses, meats and vegetables to the table. On some days, cold cuts replace smoked fish. Plus country bread, jam and honey. Cereals, milk, juice, coffee, tea on the bar.
lunch1: During the day, we invite you for dinner, which consists of three dishes served to the table. We start with the soup, then the main course, and finally the dessert. We always try to choose dishes so that they are not only tasty, but also suitable for the Warmian countryside.
extra: The restaurant also serves fast food such as fries and burgers.
extra1: Throughout the day you can also buy alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks here. We cordially invite you to try delicious cocktails, such as Aperol Spritz, which perfectly refreshes on hot summer days, or the classic Mojito.
